content:
The provided code chunk is part of a method within the `GarbageReport` class, which generates a formatted log of garbage items detected in memory. The purpose of this section is to prepare a header and format specifier for listing each garbage item with an index, facilitating clear identification and review of potential memory leaks.

# log each individual item with a number in front of it
            if not self._args.fullReport:
                abbrev = '(abbreviated) '
            else:
                abbrev = ''
            s.append('===== Garbage Items %s=====' % abbrev)
            digits = 0
            n = numGarbage
            while n > 0:
                yield None
                digits += 1
                n = n // 10
            format = '%0' + '%s' % digits + 'i:%s \t%s'
